name: 11th International Conference on Signal Image Processing and Multimedia
content: 11th International Conference on Signal Image Processing and Multimedia (SIPM 2023) May 27 \~ 28, 2023, Vancouver, Canada https://acsit2023.org/sipm/index Scope 11th International Conference on Signal Image Processing and Multimedia (SIPM 2023) focuses on all technical and practical aspects of Signal Image Processing and Multimedia. The goal of this conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding recent developments this area and establishing new collaborations in these areas. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the areas of Signal Image Processing and Multimedia & its applications. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following: • Data Analytics and Machine Learning • Applied Digital Signal Processing • Audio, Image, and Video Processing • Biomedical Signal Processing and System • Coding and Transmission • Deep Learning: Algorithms, Implementations, and applications • Digital Multimedia Broadcasting • Digital Signal Processing in Communications • Education and Training • Emerging Technologies in Digital Signal Processing • Emerging Technologies • Human Biometrics and Security Systems • Image & Signal Processing Applications • Image Acquisition and Display • Image and Video Processing & Analysis • Image Formation • Image Scanning, Display and Printing • Internet of Things Technology • Medical Signal Acquisition, Analysis and Processing • Multimedia & Applications • Multimedia Analysis and Internet • Multimedia and Artificial Intelligence • Multimedia Applications • Multimedia Communication and Networking • Multimedia Content Understanding • Multimedia Databases and File Systems • Multimedia Human-machine Interface and Interaction • Multimedia Interface and Interaction • Multimedia Security and Content Protection • Multimedia Security and Forensics • Multimedia Signal Processing • Multimedia Standards and Related Issues • Multimedia Systems and Devices • Operating System Mechanisms for Multimedia • Signal and Image Processing • Signal and Information Processing in Education • Signal and Information Processing for Smart Systems • Storage and Retrieval • Virtual Reality and 3-D Imaging • Wireless, Mobile Computing and Multimedia Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by February 12, 2023\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from SIPM 2023, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal. • Signal & Image Processing : An International Journal (SIPIJ) • International Journal of VLSI Design & Communication Systems (VLSICS) • International Journal of Embedded Systems and Applications (IJESA) • International Journal on Organic Electronics (IJOE) • International Journal of Multimedia & Its Applications (IJMA) - ERA Indexed Important Dates • Submission Deadline : February 12, 2023 • Authors Notification : April 29, 2023 • Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due : May 06, 2023 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : sipm@acsit2023.org or sipm@acsit2023.org Paper Submission Link : https://acsit2023.org/submission/index.php
